content: There is no review title that positively indicates gender neutrality for this product. However, there are several quotes from reviews that do not indicate a specific gender and could be seen as gender-neutral. For example, "Daughter loved it and it fit her great!" and "Fits as expected. My daughter is an average sized 7 year old and this size 7 fits as I would hope. It is comfy and warm." These quotes use neutral language and do not specify a gender, making them gender-neutral.
